name: tree
description: > **Problem Domain** Implement a binary tree and binary search tree data structures. ## Binary Tree Implementation - The BinaryTree class should support methods to: - PreOrderO: Traverse the tree in pre-order (Root, Left, Right). - ln0rder(): Traverse the tree in inâ€”order (Left, Root, Right). - PostOrdero: Traverse the tree in post-order (Left, Right, Root). - Print(): Display the tree in the console in a structured way. ## Binary Search Tree (BST) Implementation - The BinarySearchTree class should support methods to: - Add(value): Add a node with the specified value in the correct location to maintain BST properties. - Contains(value): Return true if the value exists in the tree, otherwise false. - Remove(value): Remove the node with the specified value while maintaining BST properties. ### Whiteboard Image
